```{r library}
library("rwunderground")
library("lubridate")
library("readr")
library("dplyr")
```

```{r directory}
dir_read <- file.path("..", "inst", "extdata")
```

```{r wx_read}
wx_ames <-
  read_csv(
    file = file.path(dir_read, "wx_ames.csv"),
    locale = locale(tz = "America/Chicago")
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    fog = as.logical(fog),
    rain = as.logical(rain),
    snow = as.logical(snow),
    hail = as.logical(hail),
    thunder = as.logical(thunder),
    tornado = as.logical(tornado)
  )
```

```{r}
devtools::use_data(wx_ames, overwrite = TRUE)
```
